summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 34th Court West, as established by Ordinance No. 76374, in Block 5, Magnolia View Addition, Division No. 2, from Magnolia Boulevard to the southeasterly terminus of said street; and a certain easement; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14732 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
